unnormalised: I read somewhere that almost 70% of Indian companies faced ransomware attacks in 2023! Seriously, guys, update your systems. My cousin, Rahul, who works at Infosys, told me their security team uses some expensive tool, costing around $10k per year, but smaller businesses need to be careful too. Enable 2FA, people! And don't click on suspicious links - especially those "You've won â‚¹1 crore!" scams.
normalised: I read somewhere that almost seventy percent of Indian companies faced ransomware attacks in two thousand and twenty three! Seriously, guys, update your systems. My cousin, Rahul, who works at I-n-f-o-s-y-s, told me their security team uses some expensive tool, costing around dollar ten thousand per year, but smaller businesses need to be careful too. Enable two factor authentication, people! And don't click on suspicious links - especially those "You've won rupee one crore!" scams.
